title: jahrei.me Portfolio Website
description: A minimalist, high-performance portfolio website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing advanced frontend development skills and modern web standards.
details:
Technical Architecture & Features:

  • 100% vanilla HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript - no frameworks or build tools
  • Fully responsive design with mobile-first approach and dynamic navigation
  • Advanced CSS Grid and Flexbox layouts with custom property-based design system
  • Dynamic project loading system with JSON-based content management
  • Interactive project galleries with lightbox functionality and thumbnail navigation
  • Sophisticated filtering system using data attributes and DOM manipulation
  • Custom animations including Matrix-style code rain and smooth scroll behaviors
  • Intersection Observer API for performance-optimized scroll animations
  • Sticky navigation with transform-based hide/show behavior
  • Semantic HTML structure with proper accessibility considerations

Performance & User Experience:

  • Optimized for Core Web Vitals with minimal external dependencies
  • Progressive enhancement ensuring functionality across all modern browsers
  • Mobile hamburger menu with smooth transitions and proper touch interactions
  • Advanced overlay system for expandable project details and social connections
  • Cross-device compatibility with responsive typography and adaptive layouts
  • GitHub Pages deployment with automated CI/CD pipeline

Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript, GitHub Pages, Git
